# Edward Barry (cricketer)

Edward Albert Barry (8 June 1898 â€“ 24 November 1965) was an English cricketer. A left-handed batsman and left-arm medium pace bowler, he played two first-class matches for Ireland in the summer of 1926, against Oxford University and Scotland. He did not play for Ireland again.
